00001 subroutine laser
00002 
00003   use physvars
00004   implicit none
00005 
00006   integer :: ierr
00007 
00008   !  Laser focal position and rezoning
00009 
00010   laser_focus: select case(beam_config)
00011 
00012   case(4)  ! standing wave fpond
00013      if (itime>0) focus(1) = x_crit  ! laser tracks n_c
00014 
00015 
00016   case(5)  ! propagating fpond
00017      !  Trigger rezoning if laser rezone_frac of the way through plasma
00018      ! - Only works after restart at present
00019      if (restart .and. beam_config ==5 .and. focus(1) >= window_min + x_plasma*rezone_frac) then
00020         if (my_rank==0) then
00021            write (*,*) 'REZONE'
00022            !           read (*,*) go
00023         endif
00024 
00025         call rezone
00026         !        window_min = window_min + dt
00027      else
00028         focus(1) = focus(1) + dt  ! propagate forward by c*dt - can include v_g here
00029         propag_laser=propag_laser + dt
00030      endif
00031 
00032   case default
00033      ! leave focal point unchanged
00034 
00035   end select laser_focus
00036 
00037 end subroutine laser
